overview: And the nights are as hot as the daze ... When sizzling new superstar Lanny has a pool party, the talk turns to sex and the bikini's come off as fast as the barby goes on! And Lanny's not satisfied with regular sex either ... she's got an ass to fill! Lanny's Summer Daze. Nude volleyball. Nude swimming. And plenty of deep end to sink your dick into!
title: Lanny's Summer Daze
